summary: Changes load screens to something more Sheogorath for Dawnguard
descriptionHtml:
[size=+2][color=Red][b]Due to not enough time and possible making of a few other mods, this mod will be put on hold and no further updates will be made.[/b][/color][/size]

[size=+2][color=Red][b]What Is This?[/b][/color][/size]
This is a continuation of my Sheogorath Load Screens.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]What Have You Done?[/b][/color][/size]
Changed all Dawnguard loadscreens except for a silver sword load screen I think which I cant find...or maybe I did. I dont know.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Why?[/b][/color][/size]
Because I wanted to continue my collection.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Do I Need Your First Mod?[/b][/color][/size]
No
Forties Sheogorath Dawnguard Load Screens is stand alone you don\'t need 
Forties Sheogorath Load Screens 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32103
Although it is recommended to use both to achieve full effect.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Updates?[/b][/color][/size]
Any if needed.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Will You Add Them All Into One Mod?[/b][/color][/size]
Once I have finished all DLC load screens I will put them into one Mod.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Why No Images?[/b][/color][/size]
Well no matter what I did I couldn\'t get any Dawnguard loadscreens to load.
The Silver Sword Image shows the one I cant figure out how to change and the troll one is just a tiny sample.
Once I get more loadscreens to load I\'ll add more

[size=+4][color=Yellow][b]My Other Mods[/b][/color][/size]
Forties Sheogorath Load Screens 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32103/
Forties Alchemy Shack 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30448
Forties A Nords Dos And Donts Of Skyrim
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32771
author: Fortie
